name: Supreme Interface Pixelart UI Pack
description:
Supreme Interface is a complete UI pack made in pixel art style.  
In the embed project, you can test almost every element. Buying this asset allows me to create more packs like this or update them from time to time.

Content: 

  • Panels
    • Default
    • Header
    • Tab group
    • Left Slider
    • Right Slider
  • Buttons 
    •  6 long [cyan, red, blue, yellow, red, pink]
    • 6 square [cyan, red, blue, yellow, red, pink]
    • 2 slider specific
  • Sliders
    • Long Handle x2
    • Short Handle x2
  • Icons x20
  • Toggles
    • Square x3
    • Triangle x3
    • Rhombus x3
    • Round x3
    • Round-Up x3
    • Round-Down x3

Enjoy and leave a comment!

*Important*  Unity project is not included yet and sections like "Examples", "Panels" or "Dropdown" are made inside of unity based on primitive elements.

Suggestion:

  • When you are on Windows, go to View, and group files by type - it would create a much cleaner space to work with.

License:

  • This asset pack can be used in both free and commercial projects.   You can modify it to suit your own needs.  Credit is not needed but appreciated. You may not redistribute it or resell it.
